question: One morning Udai and Vishal were talking to each other face to face at a crossing. If Vishal's shadow was exactly to the left of Udai, which direction was Udai facing?
Y is in the East of X which is in the North of Z. If P is in the South of Z, then in which direction of Y, is P?
answer_description: P is in South-West of Y.

question: If South-East becomes North, North-East becomes West and so on. What will West become?
answer_description: It is clear from the diagrams that new name of West will become South-East.

question: A man walks 5 km toward south and then turns to the right. After walking 3 km he turns to the left and walks 5 km. Now in which direction is he from the starting place?
Rahul put his timepiece on the table in such a way that at 6 P.M. hour hand points to North. In which direction the minute hand will point at 9.15 P.M. ?
answer_description: At 9.15 P.M., the minute hand will point towards west.
